title: How can I get Thunderbird 139.1 to create the same email categories and folders as those on my provider's webmail site?
content:
Thunderbird has eliminated a primary SENT category and I can't find how to get it and other primary folders within my provider, Spectrum Internet/Email, email website/webpage(s). How do I get them back? I do NOT want to have to uninstall Thunderbird, clear my cache, then reinstall it and set it all up from the get-go. Any real answers for me?

Thanks

title: Agenda compte exchange
content: Bonjour, Depuis l'installation de la dernière version 139.0, je n'ai plus accès à mon agenda microsoft exchange. Le module complémentaire TBSync n'est plus pris en charge. Merci de m'indique comment procéder pour avoir à nouveau accès en lecture et écriture de cet agenda.

title: Previous email data
content:
Hi everyone,

I could really use some help with Mozilla Thunderbird.

I had my official email set up in Thunderbird using a POP3 connection. Before I updated Windows and reinstalled Thunderbird, I backed everything up — all the emails and settings.

Now, after reinstalling Thunderbird, I’m trying to get my old emails and account settings back, but I just can’t seem to make it work. I tried copying my old profile folder over the new one, but nothing shows up properly.

I’m not sure if I’m doing something wrong or missing a step. Can someone please walk me through how to properly restore a POP3 email backup in Thunderbird? I really need to get my old emails back.

Thanks a lot in advance!
creator: adilishaqacca

title: thunderbird android backup emails to mbox
content: i know that thunderbird for android works differently than desktop version, that's ok. i ask here to add to thunderbird-android function of backup emails to mbox-file, collect emails from selected server and make backup in mbox file which can than be opened in thunderbird-desktop. i must emphasize, i don't ask that thunderbird-android should be capable of handling mbox-files, this would be pure backup functionality.
creator: nobody.anybody

title: How to Switch the Outlook PST files into Thunderbird Account?
content: Are you switch the Outlook PST files into Thunderbird Account. I recommended the GainTools PST to MBOX Converter Tool is fast solution to switch the Outlook PST files into Thunderbird .mbox file format. This tool supports all email clients of the MBOX file such as Apple Mail, Power Mail, Thunderbird, Eudora, etc. You can easily to convert one and multiple PST files into MBOX file format. It allows to convert all emails from PST files into MBOX file format. It supports all Windows OS versions.
creator: christopher_scott2025
